install.name: Disqus Comment System for Joomla! (by JoomlaWorks)
install.author: JoomlaWorks
install.copyright: This extension in released under the GNU/GPL License - http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html
install.description: Thank you for installing the DISQUS comment system for Joomla!

param.name: disqusSubDomain
param.label: Your Disqus subdomain
param.description: Set the subdomain to what you registered with Disqus (without '.disqus.com').

param.name: selectedCategories
param.label: Select categories to render the plugin

param.name: selectedMenus
param.label: Select menu items to render the plugin

param.name: disqusListingCounter
param.label: Display a comments counter/anchor link in listings (e.g. blogcategory)

param.name: disqusArticleCounter
param.label: Display a comments counter/anchor link in article view

param.name: disqusDevMode
param.label: Test Disqus comments on a local/development server
param.description: This option will enable Disqus comments without having to upload your website on the actual domain associated with Disqus.

param.name: debugMode
param.label: Debug mode
param.description: Enable this option to display possible errors or other warnings. Useful for debugging.
